basic_information.scholarship_name: The Benjamin Odom and Teresa Craig Endowed Scholarship in Political Science

description: The purpose of this scholarship is to provide scholarships for students majoring in Political Science. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Political Science major Must submit a one to two-paragraph bio that demonstrates a commitment to leadership and service Must demonstrate financial need Preference will be given to incoming students.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
